sourcesContent:
Quantity confirmed reservations
{{ numberReservations }}
Minimum places
{{ minimumReservations }}
Quantity total reservation
{{ maximumReservations }}
Tickets
{{ tickets }}
Previous earnings
{{ previousEarnings | currency }}
No further reservations possible.
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'jhi-reservation-counter', templateUrl: './reservation-counter.component.html', styleUrls: ['reservation-counter.component.scss'] }) export class ReservationCounterComponent { @Input() numberReservations!: number; @Input() maximumReservations!: number; @Input() previousEarnings!: number; @Input() minimumReservations: number; @Input() tickets: number; isMaximum(): boolean { if (this.numberReservations === this.maximumReservations) { return true; } else { return false; } } }
